histogram.name: UserAnnotations.AddFormSubmissionResult
histogram.summary: Records the result of a form submission to user annotations service. Recorded for each form submission that is allowed to be stored in the user annotations database.

histogram.name: UserAnnotations.CountEntries.Result
histogram.summary: Records the result of counting entries within a certain time frame from user annotations service. Recorded for each call to count entries from the browsing data removal UI.

histogram.name: UserAnnotations.RemoveAllEntries.Result
histogram.summary: Records the result of removing all entries from user annotations service. Recorded for each remove all entries call from the database via the management UI.

histogram.name: UserAnnotations.RemoveEntry.Result
histogram.summary: Records the result of removing a single entry from user annotations service. Recorded for each user annotation entry removal from the database via the management UI.
